column4: i just told him that, he can even use \ if his list is LONG and hes typing it all out, i have a afinstall.sh that installs all my stuff.
ah, sorry. Just noticed you got in :) ... always nice to know everyone is willing to try :)
i told him to use * card to help find his packages.
you're doing such a good job for me, I'll sit back and drink my coffee :)
